ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Uses inverse probability weighting methods to estimate treatment effect under marginal structure model for the cause-specific hazard of competing risk events. Estimates also the cumulative incidence function (i.e. risk) of the potential outcomes, and provides inference on risk difference and risk ratio. Reference: Kalbfleisch & Prentice (2002)<doi:10.1002/9781118032985>; Hernan et al (2001)<doi:10.1198/016214501753168154>.

Uses inverse probability weighting methods to estimate treatment effect under marginal structure model for the cause-specific hazard of competing risk events. Estimates also the cumulative incidence function (i.e. risk) of the potential outcomes, and provides inference on risk difference and risk ratio. Reference: Kalbfleisch & Prentice (2002)<doi:10.1002/9781118032985>; Hernan et al (2001)<doi:10.1198/016214501753168154>.

name: r-cmprskcoxmsm
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.2.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-cmprskcoxmsm
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/cmprskcoxmsm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/cmprskcoxmsm/cmprskcoxmsm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9366d41e7f23cb753bcd8ef0aa579be7994be9d7d891a19db888818df7b727e0

build:
  number: 3
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-sandwich
    - r-survival
    - r-twang
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-sandwich
    - r-survival
    - r-twang

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('cmprskcoxmsm')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('cmprskcoxmsm')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=cmprskcoxmsm
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: 'Uses inverse probability weighting methods to estimate treatment effect under marginal
    structure model for the cause-specific hazard of competing risk events. Estimates
    also the cumulative incidence function (i.e. risk) of the potential outcomes, and
    provides inference on risk difference and risk ratio. Reference: Kalbfleisch & Prentice
    (2002)<doi:10.1002/9781118032985>; Hernan et al (2001)<doi:10.1198/016214501753168154>.'
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - leej3
